snippet.title: Hungry Horrors - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Step into the enchanting world of Hungry Horrors, an indie roguelike deck-building game where cooking is your weapon! 🥘✨ Explore the mythical British Isles as a brave princess on a quest to save her kingdom from legendary creatures inspired by British, Irish, Scottish, Welsh, and Celtic folklore. 🏰👑

Instead of combat, master the art of preparing traditional dishes to satisfy the monstrous appetites of folklore beasts like Black Annis, Jenny Greenteeth, and Grendel. Each dish could mean the difference between life and death! 🍲⚔️

Wishlist Hungry Horrors on Steam now to stay updated on the latest news, exclusive content, and release information! 🌟

🔥 Key Features:

 • Unique roguelike gameplay combining deck-building with culinary strategy
 • Legendary creatures from Celtic, English, Irish, Scottish, and Welsh myths
 • Beautifully handcrafted pixel art
 • Diverse biomes and encounters with mythical monsters
 • Uncover secrets, discover legendary artefacts, and rescue familiars
 • Epic culinary encounters with folklore beasts

Don’t miss out on this one-of-a-kind gaming experience where every recipe is a challenge, and every meal could save your life!

👉 Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/4dQ12bB

#HungryHorrors #IndieGame #Roguelike #DeckBuilding #Folklore #MythicalMonsters #PixelArt #GameTrailer #SteamGames
